movie.title: LBJ
movie.plot: The story of U.S. President Lyndon Baines Johnson from his young days in West Texas to the White House.

events.title: Lyndon B. Johnson is inaugurated following the assassination of John F. Kennedy
Lyndon B. Johnson appeals to Congress to pass the Civil Rights Act
Lyndon B. Johnson signs the Civil Rights Act into law
